body_html:
I have the same issue:
Ubuntu 16.04 aarch64 with Titan X

I installed pytorch within a conda environment:
conda search 'cudnn'
Fetching package metadata ...........
cudnn 5.1 0 defaults
5.1.10 cuda7.5_0 defaults
5.1.10 cuda8.0_0 defaults
6.0 0 defaults
6.0.21 cuda7.5_0 defaults
* 6.0.21 cuda8.0_0 defaults
7.0.5 cuda8.0_0 defaults

conda search 'pytorch'

  • 0.3.0 py36cuda8.0cudnn6.0_0 defaults

nvcc --version
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2016 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Tue_Jan_10_13:22:03_CST_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61

body:
I have the same issue:
Ubuntu 16.04 aarch64 with Titan X 

I installed pytorch within a conda environment:
conda search 'cudnn'
Fetching package metadata ...........
cudnn                        5.1                           0  defaults        
                             5.1.10                cuda7.5_0  defaults        
                             5.1.10                cuda8.0_0  defaults        
                             6.0                           0  defaults        
                             6.0.21                cuda7.5_0  defaults        
                          *  6.0.21                cuda8.0_0  defaults        
                             7.0.5                 cuda8.0_0  defaults   

 conda search 'pytorch'
*  0.3.0           py36cuda8.0cudnn6.0_0  defaults

nvcc --version
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2016 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Tue_Jan_10_13:22:03_CST_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61
